body_html:
@girving I have implemented confusion matrix according to your implementation. Thanks for displaying this approach, I should have used tensorflow built-in functions to implement confusion matrix.

Furthermore, I could not use values=[1] in SparseTensor. It is required that values has the same amount of elements as the first dimension of the indices matrix.

Finally, if there is anything that I can improve in the function or its tests, please let me know.
